# Interface: INftUnlock

An unlock which must reference a previous unlock which unlocks the NFT that the input is locked to.

## Hierarchy

- [`ITypeBase`](ITypeBase.md)<`3`\>

  ↳ **`INftUnlock`**

- [reference](INftUnlock.md#reference)

• **type**: `3`

The type of the object.

### reference

• **reference**: `number`

The reference.
